thread.title: David Carter

author: David Carter
title: David Carter
text:
My tyres weren't in stock when I called, which resulted a in a one day delay, but they weren't in stock at any of the local firms either.
Although price wasn't that much of an issue in deciding which company to choose, it turned out that I saved around Â£20 per tyre by using tyres on the Drive.
I ordered 4 tyres and arranged fitting at my office and was given a date and a time slot.
The tyres were changed quickly without any fuss, while I was able to carry on doing my work, instead of sitting around for an hour in a freezing cold, unwelcoming waiting room, which is what I would have done if I'd gone to a tyre fitters premises.
All in all, a positive experience which I'd recommend.
